name: Sayf Eddine Hammemi
body:
# ### Welcome to my Github Pages :
My name is Sayf Eddine Hammemi, I am an enthusiastic computer programmer and a computer science engineer student. I like to program in C++, Python and JavaScript generally but I am open to other challenges

## Here is a List of my repositories :


### [Paste](https://github.com/piratos/paste)
This is a very simple Django application, it mimic the working of pastebin, although it automatically detects the programming language being used and highlights the code based on that language.

### [CTFBulletin](https://github.com/piratos/ctfbulletin)
This is a full battery included catch the flag platform, it includes the catch the flag competition scoreboard and problem submission, a simple forum (Talks), a blog to publish writeups and finally a full training application that helps challengers sharpening their skills.

### [Ballagh(TN) = report](https://github.com/piratos/ballagh)
This application helps citizen of any country to report bribes and any other administration and power misusing. The application contains an interactive maps and PDF report generation tools.

### [CriMap](https://github.com/piratos/crimap)
As mentioned in its name, this application helps to indicate the dangerous spots in cities, people can help each other by warning of different dangerous place not to visit or to visit with precaution. This service is based on community impact and it keeps the privacy of people submitting cases. Also it includes statistics that may help journalist, social researcher or public forces.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
